featured.text: Specifically, you will learn to prepare __(23)__ delicious items as roasted chicken, chili, turkey loaf, turkey loaf, meatballs, pasta, among others.

definition.zh_def: 肉丸，一種用肉類和其他成分製成的圓形食物，通常經過烹煮或炸製。
definition.en_def: A meatball is a round ball made from ground meat and other ingredients, typically cooked by frying, baking, or simmering.
definition.example: She served spaghetti with homemade meatballs for dinner.
